headline.main: INDICTMENT OF HILL UPHELD BY COURT; Justice Permits Counsel for Aide to Fish to View Minates

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 25 -- The indictment charging George Hill, assistant secretary to Representative Hamilton Fish, with perjury before a local Federal grand jury investigating Nazi activities, was upheld by Justice James W. Morris in the Federal District Court today.
